resources.doc: This entity represents an individual for whom instruction, services and/or care are provided in an early childhood, elementary or secondary educational program under the jurisdiction of a school, education agency, or other institution or program. A student is a person who has been enrolled in a school or other educational institution. For more information, see the schema for the $$Student$$ resources. For this open ended URI, only current and directly associated entities are returned. For teachers, this is /sections/{IDs}/studentSectionAssociations/students. {IDs} represents a list of section IDs to which the teacher is currently associated. For staff, this is /schools/{IDs}/studentSchoolAssociations/students. {IDs} represents a list of the school or education organization IDs to which the staff is currently associated.
